Pre-Game Insights: Croatia showed great fighting spirit after coming from two goals down against Portugal.
Poland relied on a penalty in the dying minutes to secure their win against Scotland.
Luka Modric and Robert Lewandowski are key players to watch for their respective teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being played at Opus Arena.
Croatia are unbeaten in their last four home matches.
Poland have won just once in their last four matches.
Croatia and Poland have a head-to-head record of 3-1-1.
